synopsis.text: Ai Hoshino is a young and rising pop idol who has captured the hearts of fans across the country. However, behind her cheerful public persona lies a major secret - she is pregnant. Knowing a scandal could ruin her career, Ai travels to the countryside to secretly give birth under the care of Dr. Gorou Amemiya. On the night Ai goes into labor, tragedy strikes as Dr. Amemiya is killed by Ai's crazed stalker. But in an inexplicable turn of events, the doctor is reborn as Ai's newborn son, Aquamarine. Now navigating show business as the child of his favorite idol, Aquamarine sees firsthand the dark underbelly hiding beneath the glitz and glamor. With his mother's career on the rise, he helps Ai reach new heights of fame all while keeping her pregnancy secret. However, greater challenges await, and Aquamarine must discover whether the web of lies in the entertainment world will ultimately break his bond with Ai. Full of twists and turns, this story explores the intertwining lives of an idol and her greatest fan turned child. It is an emotional tale about the length one will go to protect their dreams and the loved ones who make it all worthwhile.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
